title: Gaussian Mixture Model
description: This lab will guide you through the implementation of Gaussian Mixture Models (GMMs) using the scikit-learn library in Python. GMMs are probabilistic models that assume that the data is generated from a mixture of several Gaussian distributions. They are widely used in various fields such as computer vision, finance, and bioinformatics for clustering and density estimation tasks.

meta.title: Mastering Gaussian Mixture Models with Python
meta.description: Dive into the world of Gaussian Mixture Models and learn how to implement them using the scikit-learn library in Python.
meta.keywords: machine learning, data clustering, gmm, python, scikit learn, gaussian mixture models, machine learning playground

i18n.title: 高斯混合模型
i18n.description: 本实验将指导你使用 Python 中的 scikit-learn 库实现高斯混合模型（GMM）。高斯混合模型是概率模型，假设数据是由多个高斯分布的混合生成的。它们在计算机视觉、金融和生物信息学等各个领域广泛用于聚类和密度估计任务。

meta.title: 用 Python 掌握高斯混合模型
meta.description: 深入了解高斯混合模型的世界，并学习如何使用 Python 中的 scikit-learn 库来实现它们。
meta.keywords: 机器学习, 数据聚类, GMM, Python, scikit learn, 高斯混合模型, 机器学习游乐场

steps.title: 实现贝叶斯高斯混合模型
